Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards

Class CardSide.Serializer

java.lang.Object
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer<CardSide>
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.std.StdSerializer<CardSide>
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.cards.CardSide.Serializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatVisitable, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonschema.SchemaAware, Serializable
Enclosing class:
CardSide
public static class CardSide.Serializer extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.std.StdSerializer<CardSide>
Custom serializer for CardSide, used when saving a player's playing field. This serializer only saves the side type ("front" or "back").
